response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 to us due to its unique features, high-quality materials, and the extensive research and development that went into its creation. Considering its immense value and the benefits it can bring to you, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to purchase it for $12,000. This special offer is designed to provide you with an attractive deal while ensuring we receive a fair return for our investment. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
